author: umagesh
msg: Ensure maxWaitMIllis and checkEveryMillis results in proper values irrespective of the order in which the setter methods are called.

author: donaldp
msg: Update to remove warnings generated by antcall due to last immutability tightening. Did this by adding a protected constructor to property.
Made sure that operations internal to Project could not generate these warnings by adding a new setPropertyInternal method that didn't do any checks.
Also made the getUserProperties and getProperties methods return copies of maps rather than direct references.
Updated WHATSNEW to warn about these issues.
Added some unit tests to verify that property immutability is enforced - where we actually do enforce it ;)

msg: Display to the user another cause of task not found exception being thrown.

msg: Valid values for waitforunit and checkeveryunit provided.
